name: Robocup : Small-Sized League
desc: Prometheus is a small-sized robot designed for competitive robot soccer in the Small-Sized League.

name: Continuous Galvanizing Emulator
desc: The CAD design showcases a scaled-down model of a continuous galvanizing line, a tool that emulating the process.

name: Osiris Robot
desc: Osiris: A 3D-printed autonomous robot geared up to be to follow a path independently and steer clear of obstacles
